column4: I'm upgrading to 8.04 from 7.10 and the when the update manager was showing that the process had less than one min to complete, the update manager showed en error and quit. How can I make sure that the upgrade is successful?
run "sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get dist-upgrade" then "lsb_release -a"
While upgrading, it was not able to upgrade one package - slapd. lsb_release -a is showing the release as 8.04
